textBeforeTable: Maloja Size chart summer mountain biking Recommended Use: 3/4-length (invisible) Zip: 3 rear Pockets: anatomic Fit: Light Piquee 100 Material: Tech Specs The Maloja AnitaM. Short-Sleeve Jersey is available in sizes from X-Small to X-Large, and in the colors Blue Steel, Granat, Hazelnut, Moonless, Pine, and Rose. Maloja's AnitaM. Short-Sleeve Jersey is made from the Light Piquee fabric. As its names suggests, this material is extremely lightweight, but what's not alluded to is its effective moisture management system. The fabric's light polyester knit grabs sweat, and transfers it to the quick-drying surface; leaving you cool, dry, and comfortable. And to keep your friends comfortable at the post-ride meal, the AnitaM. uses a Polygiene treatment that prevents the accumulation of odor in the jersey's fabric—no stink, more friends. If you don't think that the jersey's short-sleeve design and breathable fabric selection provides enough ventilation, the AnitaM.
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Natural Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg.
